compat-change.description:
Starting in {@link android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES#R}, there is a new public API overload {@link #onChange(boolean, Uri, int)} that delivers a {@code int flags} argument.

Some apps may be relying on a previous hidden API that delivered a {@code int userId} argument, and this change is used to control delivery of the new {@code int flags} argument in its place.
compat-change.name: ADD_CONTENT_OBSERVER_FLAGS
